name: Music_807.wav
keywords: ['choir song', 'male voices', 'female voices', 'no instruments', 'acapella', 'moderate tempo', 'gospel hymn']
caption: This choir song features male and female voices. The voices sing different parts. The female voices sing the soprano and alto parts. The male voices sing the tenor and bass parts. The voices sing in harmony. This is an acapella song. There are no instruments in this song. The song is a gospel hymn. This song can be played in a historic animation movie before a battle scene.
